means: <美>联觉的，牵连感觉的，共同感觉的

list.abs: ...ear=1996 |pages= |isbn=0-631-19764-8 |oclc=59664610具有联觉的人通常被称作联觉人（synesthete）。真正的联觉是无意识的，文学修辞手法的通感（如“苦涩的风”或“尖利的笑声”等）有时也会被描述为“联觉的”。据估算平均.

means.word_mean: 1. relating to or experiencing synesthesia; involving more than one sense;

auth_sentence.content: These are among the questions posed by this synesthetic summer group show.
auth_sentence.res_content: These are among the questions posed by this synesthetic summer group show.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These are among the questions posed by this synesthetic summer group show.

auth_sentence.content: Hence synesthetic connections could for the first time represent movement with static images.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hence synesthetic connections could for the first time represent movement with static images.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hence synesthetic connections could for the first time represent movement with static images.

auth_sentence.content: Rather it is the synesthetic connectivity between our senses which labels a face with an identity.
auth_sentence.res_content: Rather it is the synesthetic connectivity between our senses which labels a face with an identity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Rather it is the synesthetic connectivity between our senses which labels a face with an identity.
